goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a yellow object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
